name: European Economic Chamber (EEC) Nepal
goal: works for bilateral promotion trade, investment, tourism and technology transfer between European and Nepalese business companies
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives: works as per EU policies, initiatives and legislative while dealing and executing projects with European companies and EU
